r.s: A public frontend for a University Event Publishing system.
r.d: This class extends the UNL UCBCN backend system to create a client frontend. It allows users to view the calendar in a list view, thirty day view.
r.n: Correct date time output. Calendar will now show date when event does not end on the same day (both in event listing and event instance). Small speed improvements, strtotime is only called once per event. Javascript fixes for search form. Fix XML output format.
